GET
/v1/vendors
This will return all the users vendors
GET
/v1/vendors/:id
This will get the users vendor matching with the :id given
POST
/v1/vendors
This create a new vendor for the current user
And a reply with the new vendor object
PUT
/v1/vendors/:id
This update the vendor matching :id
And a reply with the updated vendor object
DELETE
/v1/vendors/:id
This will delete the vendor with matching :id and reply with the deleted vendor object
